xmlquery.searchEmployeeKPILike: Select * from smhris_employee_kpi where idEmployee like ?
xmlquery.deleteEmployeeKPId: Delete from smhris_employee_kpi where idKPI = ? and idEmployee = ?
xmlquery.editEmployeeKPI: Update smhris_employee_kpi set idEmployee=?, idKPI=?, targetKPI=?, targetDate=?, achievedKPI=?, achievedDate=?, startingDate=? where idEmployee=? and idKPI=?
